_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

CataloguePricingUpdate.description: A document used to update information about prices in an existing Catalogue.

CataloguePricingUpdate.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Details
CataloguePricingUpdate.description: A document used to update information about prices in an existing Catalogue.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the subset of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

UUID.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

Name.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Name
Name.description: Text, assigned by the sender, that identifies this document to business users.

IssueDate.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

RevisionDate.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Revision Date. Date
RevisionDate.description: The date, assigned by the seller, on which the Catalogue was revised.

RevisionTime.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Revision Time. Time
RevisionTime.description: The time, assigned by the seller, at which the Catalogue was revised.

Note.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

VersionID.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Version. Identifier
VersionID.description: Indicates the current version of the catalogue.

LineCountNumeric.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Line Count. Numeric
LineCountNumeric.description: The number of lines in the document.

ValidityPeriod.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Validity_ Period. Period
ValidityPeriod.description: A period, assigned by the seller, during which the information in the Catalogue Revision is effective. This may be given as start and end dates or as a duration.

RelatedCatalogueReference.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Related_ Catalogue Reference. Catalogue Reference
RelatedCatalogueReference.description: A reference to the Catalogue being updated.

ReferencedContract.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Referenced_ Contract. Contract
ReferencedContract.description: A contract or framework agreement with which the Catalogue is associated.

Signature.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

ProviderParty.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Provider_ Party. Party
ProviderParty.description: The party sending the Catalogue Pricing Update.

ReceiverParty.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Receiver_ Party. Party
ReceiverParty.description: The party receiving the Catalogue Pricing Update.

SellerSupplierParty.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

ContractorCustomerParty.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Contractor_ Customer Party. Customer Party
ContractorCustomerParty.description: The customer party responsible for the contracts with which the Catalogue is associated.

TradingTerms.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Trading Terms
TradingTerms.description: The trading terms associated with the Catalogue.

DefaultLanguage.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Default_ Language. Language
DefaultLanguage.description: The default language for the catalogue pricing update.

CataloguePricingUpdateLine.title: Catalogue Pricing Update. Catalogue Pricing Update Line
CataloguePricingUpdateLine.description: One or more lines in the Catalogue Pricing Update, each line updating a specific catalogue item.
